00032 #ifndef __GPG_CANVAS_H__
00033 #define __GPG_CANVAS_H__
00034 
00035 #ifdef WIN32
00036 #pragma warning (disable : 4786)
00037 #endif // WIN32
00038 
00039 #include "GPC_Canvas.h"
00040 
00041 #include "GHOST_IWindow.h"
00042 
00043 
00044 class GPG_Canvas : public GPC_Canvas
00045 {
00046 protected:
00048     GHOST_IWindow* m_window;
00049 
00050 public:
00051     GPG_Canvas(GHOST_IWindow* window);
00052     virtual ~GPG_Canvas(void);
00053 
00054     virtual void Init(void);
00055     virtual void SetMousePosition(int x, int y);
00056     virtual void SetMouseState(RAS_MouseState mousestate);
00057     virtual void SwapBuffers();
00058     virtual int GetMouseX(int x) { return x; }
00059     virtual int GetMouseY(int y) { return y; }
00060     virtual float GetMouseNormalizedX(int x);
00061     virtual float GetMouseNormalizedY(int y);
00062 
00063     virtual void ResizeWindow(int width, int height);
00064 
00065     bool BeginDraw() { return true; }
00066     void EndDraw() {};
00067 };
